data.name: F1™ 2017 ‘1988 McLAREN MP4/4 CLASSIC CAR DLC’
data.detailed_description: Complete your historic F1™ car collection in F1™ 2017 with the F1™ 2017 ‘1988 McLAREN MP4/4 CLASSIC CAR DLC’ pack, which adds the iconic 1988 McLaren MP4/4 to the game.
data.about_the_game: Complete your historic F1™ car collection in F1™ 2017 with the F1™ 2017 ‘1988 McLAREN MP4/4 CLASSIC CAR DLC’ pack, which adds the iconic 1988 McLaren MP4/4 to the game.
data.short_description: Complete your historic F1™ car collection in F1™ 2017 with the F1™ 2017 ‘1988 McLAREN MP4/4 CLASSIC CAR DLC’ pack, which adds the iconic 1988 McLaren MP4/4 to the game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
